-- Anachronox --

Anachronox growls, obviously wanting to get into a scrap 
today. "Arrr, alright... I won't attack unless you give the order." 
He arms himself. <Just make one false moves ya slagheap...> He 
thinks to himself as he absent mindedly plays with a spear, twirling 
around his finger.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Prophetus saw the female dragon come out of the volcano.
> 
> Prophetus: Jetstorm, Anachronox, stay alert. It seems our 
neighbour is 
> not alone...
> 
> Jetstorm: Just let 'em make just one wrong move!
> 
> Prophetus: No! None of that unless they attack... or I give the 
order. 
> Got that, Anachronox?
>
